name: Cubes and Basket
description:
Control your physical hand to solve puzzles with cubes.

Collect the white cubes and put them in the basket. Sounds easy, but it's not that simple. One wrong move and the cubes will fall on the table. You will need ingenuity and dexterity.

Game features:
- unusual gameplay thanks to the control of the game hand;
- the hand has physics and feels like real;
- the game has 105 levels from easy to difficult;
- levels have several solutions, it all depends on your ingenuity.
